name: Heroes of Yore
description: The greatest characters of history and mythology have been brought together in this marvelous one of a kind roleplaying game. Player's can unlock their favorite characters by completing unique story chapters, and earning Yore Coins. Become the Ultimate Hero of Yore by competing in online multiplayer battles in the monthly leaderboard. Fan favorites such as Dracula, Sherlock Holmes, Rosie the Riveter, and many more are featured! New characters, stories, and content will released as part of our early access.
